title: Pillow Cover, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen net and embroidery; cotton pillow cover
Technique: embroidered knotted net; plain weave pillow cover
description: Small pillow slip salvaged from a larger one originally made in the 18th century. Plain cotton body with deep border of embroidered knotted net, with curving floral vines and a bird.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pillow Cover, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: linen net and embroidery; cotton pillow cover
Technique: embroidered knotted net; plain weave pillow cover. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-472.
